GSD.product_version: versions from v5.14 to before v5.15.24
GSD.description:
arm64: dts: meson-sm1-odroid: use correct enable-gpio pin for tf-io regulator

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.24 by commit 162f8057192c247096c1ba4d39c8450f14b86e40, it was introduced in version v5.14 by commit 1f80a5cf74a60997b92d2cde772edec093bec4d9. For more details please see the references link.
